radius.description: The radius of the sphere for the shield.

shield_node.description: [string]Node used for positioning the shield center

charge.description: How much charge does the shield have?

recharge_delay.description: How long after taking damage will the shield start to recharge?

broken_recharge_delay.description: How long after the shield being destroyed will the shield start to recharge?

recharge_rate.description: How much charge to recharge per second.

starter_charge_on_recharge.description: How much initial charge do we get once we are no longer broken?

visual_sphere_path.description: [unit]If specified with a path, this will spawn a unit, which acts as the visual representation of the shield.

shield_break_particles.description: [particles]Particle Effect to play when the shield breaks.

shield_break_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play when the shield breaks.

shield_online_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play when the shield comes back online.

shield_idle_loop_start_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play while the shield is online.

shield_idle_loop_stop_sound.description: [wwise]Event to stop the idle loop sound.

shield_bubble_loop_start_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play from the bubble while its up.

shield_bubble_loop_stop_sound.description: [wwise]Event to stop the bubble loop sound.

start_offline.description: If above 0, how long until the shield comes online for the first time.

shield_recharging_loop_start_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play while the shield is recharging.

shield_recharging_loop_stop_sound.description: [wwise]Event to stop the shield recharging sound.

shield_pass_through_sound.description: [wwise]Event to play when camera passes shield

shield_pass_through_sound_avatar.description: [wwise]Event to play when player passes shield

shield_recharging_loop_event_node.description: [string]Node used when triggering the shield recharging sound events

shield_unit_coming_online_sound.description: [wwise]Sound event to play when the the shield is coming online.

shield_unit_coming_online_node.description: [string]Node used when triggering the shield coming online sound events.

shield_activate_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to play when the shield is activated.

shield_deactivate_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to play when the shield is deactivated.

hit_effect_receiver_type.description: The type of hit effect to play when the shield gets hit. If this is set to HitEffectReceiverType_Count, it will assume the hit effect of the HitEffectComponent.

block_melee_type.description: Determines how the shield should handle melee attacks.
